name: Amazing Fix
description:
The goal is to renovate and clean a mansion left in poor condition.

This hidden object game has some very unique features that make it quite unique in its genre. The objects to be found are arranged randomly at the start of each game, thus allowing an almost infinite level of replayability. These same objects are classified by categories to be completed. The player develops their own strategy to get the highest score or simply to end the game in the way that is most comfortable for them.
